data.text:
@RonWyden The Islamic Republic massacre is why Iran’s future must be democratic and secular. Stand with the people of Iran for a democratic transition under leadership of Reza Pahlavi. 
#KingRezaPahlavi #RezaPahlaviForIran #FreeIran #IranMassacre #IranRevolution2026

@RonWyden #IranMassacre
#IranRevolution2026
#NoDealWithIRGC
The scale is catastrophic.
Mass killings, mass arrests, torture, forced confessions, deaths in custody, home raids, school attacks, internet shutdowns.
Death toll reported at 90,000.
This cannot be normalized.
@RonWyden Let’s hope the Blazers are still in Portland if he becomes a hall of famer, so we can all celebrate his induction. It’s looking bleaker by the day.
